unnormalised: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has officially released the schedule for the upcoming ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023, set to be hosted in India. The tournament will commence on 05/10/2023, with the final match scheduled for 19/11/2023. A total of 48 matches will be played across 10 venues.
normalised: The B-C-C-I has officially released the schedule for the upcoming I-C-C Men's Cricket World Cup two thousand twenty three, set to be hosted in India. The tournament will commence on fifth October two thousand twenty three, with the final match scheduled for nineteenth November two thousand twenty three. A total of forty eight matches will be played across ten venues.

unnormalised: Key matches to watch out for include the highly anticipated India vs. Pakistan clash on 15/10/2023 at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. The semi-finals are scheduled for 15/11/2023 and 16/11/2023, respectively, locations to be determined based on team standings. Fans can book tickets online starting from 01/09/2023. All matches are scheduled to start at either 2:00 PM IST or 10:30 AM IST, depending on the day/night status.
normalised: Key matches to watch out for include the highly anticipated India versus Pakistan clash on fifteenth October two thousand twenty three at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. The semi-finals are scheduled for fifteenth November two thousand twenty three and sixteenth November two thousand twenty three, respectively, locations to be determined based on team standings. Fans can book tickets online starting from first September two thousand twenty three. All matches are scheduled to start at either two P-M I-S-T or ten thirty A-M I-S-T, depending on the day or night status.

unnormalised: This year's World Cup also includes matches played during the Diwali period; the festival falls on 12/11/2023, promising a vibrant festive atmosphere alongside thrilling cricket action. Remember to adjust your time zone accordingly if watching from abroad! For example, 2:00 PM IST is 9:30 AM GMT. A detailed match schedule with timings can be found on the BCCI website and leading sports news platforms.
normalised: This year's World Cup also includes matches played during the Diwali period; the festival falls on twelfth November two thousand twenty three, promising a vibrant festive atmosphere alongside thrilling cricket action. Remember to adjust your time zone accordingly if watching from abroad! For example, two P-M I-S-T is nine thirty A-M G-M-T. A detailed match schedule with timings can be found on the B-C-C-I website and leading sports news platforms.
